name: Skjaldmaer
description:
A Shieldmaiden is the only hope for a small town beset by monsters, but her growing power may be deadlier than any other threat.

This short 8-Bit game was originally made in 48 Hours for Ludum Dare 33, and was polished after the initial development time to be a fun twist on the silent protagonist trope. There are many potential endings, can you see the final Moral of the story?

Also includes the Original Soundtrack by Beyond the Shattered Mirror

Controls
Use WASD or the Arrow keys for movement
Space to Attack
Esc to Restart
F4 at Title to go Full Screen
